      • useChatbotCheckers

        public java.lang.String useChatbotCheckers(java.lang.String input)
        Method useChatbotCheckers assigns answers with a sequence of if's. If the users input falls into a predetermined topic, the chatbot will recognize and answer to it.
        Parameters:
        input -
        Returns:

      • randomTopicGenerator

        private java.lang.String randomTopicGenerator()
        Method randomTopicGenerator will ask random topic questions to keep the conversation going. The method will ask a random question from the list at random times.
